Operation 'texttospeech.text.synthesize' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about inputs (SynthesizeSpeechRequest structure), outputs (audio content), and use case context. Added details about request schema, voice/audio parameters, response content, and latency characteristics to improve AI agent understanding of when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Synthesizes speech synchronously: receive results after all text input has been processed.
data.summary_suggestion: Synthesize speech from text input synchronously
data.description_suggestion: Converts text input to natural-sounding speech synchronously. Accepts text or SSML input via SynthesizeSpeechRequest, applies voice selection and audio configuration parameters, and returns synthesized audio content immediately after processing completes. Suitable for real-time speech synthesis with low-latency requirements.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about inputs (SynthesizeSpeechRequest structure), outputs (audio content), and use case context. Added details about request schema, voice/audio parameters, response content, and latency characteristics to improve AI agent understanding of when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Returns a list of Voice supported for synthesis.
data.summary_suggestion: List available voices for speech synthesis
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all Voice objects supported by the Text-to-Speech service for synthesis. Returns a ListVoicesResponse containing available voices with their language codes, natural sample rates, and other voice characteristics. Supports optional language filtering via parameters to narrow results.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about what information is returned and available filtering options. Enhanced to specify response schema (ListVoicesResponse), voice attributes returned, and parameter-based filtering capability for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'texttospeech.operations.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_side_effects, not_actionable. Missing summary. Description is unclear about the actual effect (record deletion vs. operation cancellation). Added clarity that this deletes the operation record only, not the operation itself, and specified the Empty response type. Emphasized the distinction between deletion and cancellation for AI agents to avoid misuse.

data.current_description: Deletes a long-running operation. This method indicates that the client is no longer interested in the operation result. It does not cancel the operation. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`.
data.description_suggestion: Removes a long-running operation record from the server. This operation indicates client disinterest in the result but does NOT cancel the underlying operationit will continue executing. The operation record becomes inaccessible after deletion. Returns an Empty response on success. Note: Not all servers support this method; unsupported servers return UNIMPLEMENTED error.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is unclear about the actual effect (record deletion vs. operation cancellation). Added clarity that this deletes the operation record only, not the operation itself, and specified the Empty response type. Emphasized the distinction between deletion and cancellation for AI agents to avoid misuse.

data.current_description: Gets the latest state of a long-running operation. Clients can use this method to poll the operation result at intervals as recommended by the API service.
data.summary_suggestion: Get the current state of a long-running operation
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the latest state and result of a long-running operation by name. Returns an Operation object containing the current status, progress, and result (if completed). Supports polling-based monitoring of asynchronous operations. Use this method to check operation completion status and retrieve results when ready.

message: Operation 'texttospeech.operations.cancel' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is overly detailed and unclear about immediate return value (Empty response). Restructured to clarify that the method returns immediately with Empty response, cancellation is asynchronous, and polling is required to verify success. Simplified language for better AI agent comprehension of the non-blocking nature.

data.current_description: Starts asynchronous cancellation on a long-running operation. The server makes a best effort to cancel the operation, but success is not guaranteed. If the server doesn't support this method, it returns `google.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED`. Clients can use Operations.GetOperation or other methods to check whether the cancellation succeeded or whether the operation completed despite cancellation. On successful cancellation, the operation is not deleted; instead, it becomes an operation with an Operation.error value with a google.rpc.Status.code of `1`, corresponding to `Code.CANCELLED`.
data.summary_suggestion: Request cancellation of a long-running operation
data.description_suggestion: Initiates asynchronous cancellation of a long-running operation. Sends a best-effort cancellation request; success is not guaranteed. Returns an Empty response immediately. The operation may complete before cancellation takes effect. Use GetOperation to poll the operation status and verify cancellation success. On successful cancellation, the operation transitions to a CANCELLED state with error code 1. Note: Cancellation is asynchronous and non-blocking.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is overly detailed and unclear about immediate return value (Empty response). Restructured to clarify that the method returns immediately with Empty response, cancellation is asynchronous, and polling is required to verify success. Simplified language for better AI agent comprehension of the non-blocking nature.

message: Operation 'texttospeech.projects.locations.synthesizeLongAudio' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description is extremely vague about inputs, outputs, and use case. Added request schema details (SynthesizeLongAudioRequest), clarified that it returns an Operation (not direct audio), explained the asynchronous workflow with GetOperation polling, and provided context about when to use this vs. synchronous synthesis for AI agent decision-making.

data.summary_suggestion: Synthesize long-form text to speech asynchronously
data.description_suggestion: Converts long-form text to natural-sounding speech asynchronously. Accepts SynthesizeLongAudioRequest containing text/SSML input, voice selection, and audio configuration. Returns an Operation object for tracking the asynchronous synthesis job. Use GetOperation to monitor progress and retrieve the synthesized audio URI when complete. Suitable for large documents or batch processing where synchronous synthesis would timeout.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is extremely vague about inputs, outputs, and use case. Added request schema details (SynthesizeLongAudioRequest), clarified that it returns an Operation (not direct audio), explained the asynchronous workflow with GetOperation polling, and provided context about when to use this vs. synchronous synthesis for AI agent decision-making.
